text: ya 'ayuha alrusul kuluu min tayib alrizq alhlal, waemaluu al'aemal alsalht, 'iiniy bima taemalun elym, la yakhfaa ely shay' min aemalkm. walkhitab fi alayat eam llrsl- ealayhim alslam- watbaehm, wafi alayat dalil ealaa 'ana 'akl alhlal eawn ealaa aleamal alsalh, wa'ana eaqibat alharam wkhymt, waminha rada aldea'
